renderingProperty.name: Rendering mode
renderingProperty.description: Map optimization for respective User Profile

renderingProperty.name: Default Rendering mode
renderingProperty.description: Map optimization for respective User Profile based on base (parent) profile
renderingProperty.possibleValues: default, car, bicycle, pedestrian, public_transport, boat, ski

renderingProperty.name: MTB scale
renderingProperty.description: Show trails according to MTB scale

renderingProperty.name: MTB IMBA trails
renderingProperty.description: Show specifically designed trails for mountainbiking

renderingProperty.name: Hiking symbol overlay
renderingProperty.description: Render symbols of OSMC hiking traces

renderingProperty.name: Hiking routes rendered on top of roads/paths
renderingProperty.description: Render hiking routes on top of roads
